unauthorized_command: 🚫 Whoops! Looks like you don't have the magic key to use this command. 🗝️
🛑 Hold on! This command is VIP only. 😉
no_words_language: 🤔 Hmm... It's silent as a library here. No words found for that language.
📚 Looks like that language section in our library is empty. Try another!
quiz_ongoing: 🚀 Hold your horses! There's already a quiz zooming in this chat. Use /stop to halt it.
🕺 There's a quiz dance-off happening right now. Use /stop to cut the music.
no_words_specific_language: 🌍 No words sighted for "{language}". Maybe it's from another planet?
🏝️ The "{language}" section seems deserted. No words here!
provide_word: 📜 Roll out your scroll! Please share a word with us.
🎙️ Your stage! Let's hear a word from you.
quiz_started: 🎉 And... ACTION! Quiz for {language} has begun! 🚀 Your first challenge:
🥳 Ready, Set, QUIZ! Testing your {language} skills. Here's the opener:
🎉🚀 Let's get this {language} party started! 🥳 Ready...Set...Quiz! 📚
🤩 It's {language} quiz time! 🎈 Grab your thinking caps 🧢 and let's dive in! 🌊
🔥 The {language} arena is set! 🏟️ Are you the next quiz champion? 🏆 Let's find out! 💡
🎤 On your marks... {language} quiz is on the roll! 🎲 Dive into the wordy world! 🌍📖
🚦 Quiz lights are green for {language}! 🌈 Race through the questions! 🏎️🎯
quiz_stopped: 🛑✋ And just like that... the quiz is over! 🎬 Curtain's down! 🎭
🎶 The music's stopped and so has the quiz! 🎵 Time to take a breather! 💨🍹
🔚 Game over! 🎮 Hope you had a blast in this {language} quest! 🎢🎉
⌛ Time's up! ⏰ The {language} quiz has closed its doors! 🚪🔐
🎈 And... POP! 📌 The quiz bubble is burst! 💥 See ya next round! 🔄
no_ongoing: 🤷‍♂️ It's quiet... too quiet. No ongoing quiz to end.
🌌 It's a clear sky, no quiz stars twinkling right now.
correct_answer: 🌟🌟 Double stars for that one! You're on fire! 🔥🕺
💡 Eureka! That's the light bulb moment! 🎉🍾
🔔 Ding Ding Ding! We have a winner here! 🏆🥇
💥 Kaboom! You just blew our minds with that answer! 🧠🎊
incorrect_answer: 🤔 Not quite. You have {remaining_attempts} shots left. Reload and fire again!
😅 Oops! {remaining_attempts} more tries. You got this!
🤔🚫 Oopsie daisy! Try again! 🔄 You've got {remaining_attempts} more shots 🏹
😅🌪️ A slight whirlwind there. {remaining_attempts} more swings left! ⚾
💔 A tiny hiccup! Breathe 🌬️ and go again. {remaining_attempts} more chances! 🎲
👀 Peek again! That was a slip. 🍌 {remaining_attempts} more peeks! 🧐
🌊 A bit off course, sailor! 🧭 Set your compass and try {remaining_attempts} more times! ⏳
incorrect_final_answer: 🙈 Missed by a whisker! The right answer was: {correct_answer}.
🙈🎭 The drama unfolds! It was actually: {correct_answer}. 🎤
💥💔 Close but no cigar! The golden word was: {correct_answer}. 🏅
🎢 Rollercoaster of emotions! 🌀 The treasure word was: {correct_answer}. 🗝️
🍀 Needed a bit more luck there! 🌈 The magic answer was: {correct_answer}. 🎩
🔮 If only we had a crystal ball! 🌌 The star answer was: {correct_answer}. 🌠
incorrect_outdated: ⌛ Time's tricked ya! That's an old or incorrect answer. New question awaits!
🔄 That's from a past life. Try again with a fresh question!
idk_answer: 🕵️‍♂️ Giving up? Alright, here's the secret: {correct_answer}.
🤷‍♂️🎁 Throwing in the towel? Here's your gift: {correct_answer}. 🎀
🌊📦 Wave white flag? No worries! Your prize: {correct_answer}. 🏆
🎭🎫 Giving up the act? Here's your ticket to the answer: {correct_answer}. 🎟️
🌌💼 Packing up? Here's a parting gift of knowledge: {correct_answer}. 📚
🔍📬 Can't find it? Special delivery for you: {correct_answer}. 💌
reply_to_question: 📩 Which quiz you are answering to? Reply directly to the question!
invalid_json_format: 🔍 Uh-oh! That JSON seems tangled. Let's straighten it out.
🚫 Oops! Invalid JSON format. Let's keep it neat.
word_added: ✅ Success! Word added to the vault. 🎉
📚 Your word found its place in our library!
word_not_found: 🔍 Word "{word}" is playing hide and seek! Not found.
🌌 "{word}" seems to be in another galaxy. Not here!
word_removed: 🚀 Word "{word}" has been launched into space. Gone!
description_updated: ✍️ Description got a makeover! Updated and shining.
quiz_question: 🎤 Pop quiz! What's the {language} word for: {description}?
🔍 Detective time! Find the {language} word for: {description}.
🎤🌍 Global challenge! What's the {language} term for: {description}? 🤔📚
🔍🕵️ Detective mode on! Can you decode the {language} word for: {description}? 🔐🗝️
🌊🏄 Ride the {language} wave! What word matches: {description}? 🌺🤙
🌌🚀 Space mission! Find the {language} star word for: {description}. 🛸🌠
🏰🔮 In a magical realm, what's the {language} spell for: {description}? 🪄✨
quiz_fill_question: ✍️ Fill in the blank! The {language} word in: {description}.
🖊️ Pen ready? Slot the {language} word in: {description}.
✍️🎶 Lyricist challenge! Slot the {language} word into this tune: {description}. 🎼🎤
🎬🎥 Movie scene! Fill the {language} script gap in: {description}. 🍿🎞️
🍔📖 Foodie alert! Spice up the {language} recipe in: {description}. 🍲🍴
🚂📝 Station stop! Plug the {language} word into this story: {description}. 📖💼
🏖️💌 Postcard fill-in! What's the {language} word missing in this note: {description}? 🌅✉️
unsupported_language: 🚫 Oops! That language isn't in our roster. Here's what we have: {available_languages}.
🔍 Can't find that language. But we do have: {available_languages}.
start_first: 🚦 Wait! Start the engine first with /start.
🕹️ Push the /start button to kick things off!
closeness0: 🌍 Miles apart! Try a different route.
🌌🚀 Oops! You're light years away in a different galaxy! 🌍💫
🏔️🚁 You're on a different mountain peak! Slide down and try again! 🛷🌲
🌊🏝️ Looks like you're stranded on a distant island! Signal for help! 🆘🚢
🎭🃏 Playing a different act in another show! Change the stage! 🎤🎪
🌵🚗 Driving in the desert with no signs! U-turn needed! 🔄🛣️
closeness50: 🔭 I see you on the horizon! Keep going!
closeness70: 🎯 Almost a bullseye! You're on the right track.
closeness80: 🔍 Just a tiny step away! Very close!
hint: 🔦🎁 Spotlight on your hint: {hint_text}... Dance in its light! 💃🔍
🎨🖌️ Painting a hint for you: {hint_text}... Color within these lines! 🌈🎨
🎵🎧 Tune in! Your hint sounds like: {hint_text}... Sing along! 🎤🔊
🔭🏞️ Viewing platform alert! Look out for: {hint_text}... Spot the hint! 🌄🌌
📜🪄 Magical scroll reveals: {hint_text}... Cast your spell with it! 🎩✨
list_group:
📜 The royal scroll: Words for group: 
{word_list_text}.
list_no_argument: 🔍 Specify a language to unveil the words.
🌍 Which language to explore? Tell us!
list_unknown_group: 🔭 Can't see that language group from here.
list_empty_group: 🌵 It's a desert! Empty language group.
🎈 Nothing to see here. The group's empty!
english.list_description: Show the list of words for given word group or leave empty to explore all word groups.
english.quiz_description: Trigger a new quiz question. The quiz must be running for this command.
english.language_description: Change the language in which bot speaks.
english.start_description: Start the repeating quiz. Example: /start english_b2 120m.
english.add_word_description: Bot admins only: [{"word": "your word", "language": "your language", "quiz_type": "<translate> by default", "descriptions": {"english": "the translation or context"}}, ...]
english.remove_word_description: Bot admins only: remove word by it's name from all the word groups
english.change_description_description: Bot admins only: {"language": "your language", "descriptions": {"english": "word group description"}}

russian.unauthorized_command: Вы не авторизованы для использования этой команды.
russian.no_words_language: Слов для указанного языка не найдено.
russian.quiz_ongoing: В этом чате уже идет викторина! Используйте /stop чтобы остановить.
russian.no_words_specific_language: Слов для указанного языка "{language}" не найдено.
russian.quiz_started: Запущена таймированная викторина на языке: {language}! Вот первое слово:
russian.incorrect_answer: Неправильно. У вас осталось {remaining_attempts} попыток. Попробуйте ответить еще раз, ответив на это сообщение.
russian.incorrect_outdated: Ответ неверный или устаревший. Попробуйте с новым вопросом!
russian.idk_answer: Сдались так быстро? Вот ваш ответ: {correct_answer}
russian.start_first: Пожалуйста, начните викторину сначала, используя команду /start.
russian.closeness50: Вы в какой-то мере на правильном пути!
russian.list_no_argument: Пожалуйста, укажите язык для перечисления слов.
russian.list_unknown_group: Неизвестная языковая группа. Доступные языковые группы: {available_groups}
russian.add_word_description: [{"word": "ваше слово", "language": "ваш язык", "quiz_type": "<translate> по умолчанию", "descriptions": {"russian": "перевод или контекст"}}, ...]
russian.remove_word_description: любое слово можно удалить из списка

korean.quiz_ongoing: 이 채팅에서 이미 퀴즈가 진행 중입니다! 중지하려면 /stop을 사용하세요.
korean.quiz_started: {language} 언어로 타이머 퀴즈를 시작했습니다! 첫 번째 단어입니다:
korean.incorrect_answer: 틀렸습니다. {remaining_attempts}번의 시도가 남았습니다. 이 메시지에 답하여 다시 시도하세요.
korean.incorrect_outdated: 잘못되었거나 오래된 답입니다. 새로운 질문으로 다시 시도하세요.
korean.unsupported_language: 지원하지 않는 언어입니다. 사용 가능한 언어: {available_languages}
korean.start_first: /start 명령어를 사용하여 퀴즈를 먼저 시작해 주세요.
korean.closeness50: 당신은 어느 정도 올바른 길 위에 있어요!
korean.list_unknown_group: 알 수 없는 언어 그룹입니다. 사용 가능한 언어 그룹: {available_groups}
korean.start_description: 타이머를 추가할 수 있습니다, 예를 들어 start 10
korean.add_word_description: [{"word": "당신의 단어", "language": "당신의 언어", "quiz_type": "<translate> by default", "descriptions": {"korean": "번역 또는 맥락"}}, ...]
korean.remove_word_description: 목록에서 어떤 단어든 삭제할 수 있습니다

spanish.unauthorized_command: No estás autorizado para usar este comando.
spanish.no_words_language: No se encontraron palabras para el idioma especificado.
spanish.quiz_ongoing: ¡Ya hay un cuestionario en marcha en este chat! Usa /stop para detenerlo.
spanish.no_words_specific_language: No se encontraron palabras para el idioma especificado "{language}".
spanish.quiz_started: ¡Cuestionario con temporizador iniciado con el idioma: {language}! ¡Aquí tienes la primera palabra!
spanish.no_ongoing: ¡No hay ningún cuestionario en marcha para detener!
spanish.incorrect_answer: Incorrecto. Te quedan {remaining_attempts} intentos. Intenta de nuevo respondiendo a este mensaje.
spanish.incorrect_outdated: Respuesta incorrecta o desactualizada. ¡Intenta de nuevo con una nueva pregunta!
spanish.idk_answer: ¿Te rendiste ya? Aquí tienes tu respuesta: {correct_answer}
spanish.reply_to_question: Por favor, responde directamente a la pregunta.
spanish.quiz_question: ¿Cuál es la palabra (en {language}) con la descripción dada: {description}?
spanish.quiz_fill_question: Rellena la palabra (en {language}) en la frase dada: {description}
spanish.no_bot_language: Por favor, proporciona un idioma. Idiomas disponibles: {available_languages}
spanish.start_first: Por favor, inicia el cuestionario primero usando el comando /start.
spanish.list_group: Lista de palabras para el grupo: {word_list_text}
spanish.list_no_argument: Por favor, especifique un idioma para listar las palabras.
spanish.list_unknown_group: Grupo de idioma desconocido. Grupos de idioma disponibles: {available_groups}
spanish.list_empty_group: El grupo de idioma especificado está vacío...
spanish.quiz_description: Dispara una nueva pregunta del cuestionario.
spanish.start_description: se puede añadir un temporizador, por ejemplo start 10
spanish.add_word_description: [{"word": "tu palabra", "language": "tu idioma", "quiz_type": "<translate> por defecto", "descriptions": {"spanish": "la traducción o el contexto"}}, ...]
spanish.remove_word_description: cualquier palabra puede ser eliminada de la lista
